snippet.title: Tactical Monsters
snippet.description:
Tactical Monsters Rumble Arena is now available!
PLAY NOW!
1) Play now on Steam: http://bit.ly/2zBYmOv 
2) Play now on Google Play: http://bit.ly/TacticalMonsters
3) Pre-order for FREE for iPhones: http://bit.ly/TMAPPLE 
==========================================
GAME REVIEWS:
***** Globally featured by Google Play
***** Recommended by Steam in Strategy, RPG, and Adventure game categories
***** "Experience the thrill of short PVP matches – just 3 to 5 minutes in length – as you fight your monsters against other monsters from across the cosmos!” - MMO GAMES
***** "...bite sized turn based arena combat that can really suck you in." - Alpha Beta Gamer
***** "...there's no lack of content in Tactical Monsters Rumble Arena. And since this is a social game with clans, you'll be able to trade monsters with others..." - Touch Arcade
===========================================
COMMUNITY
Discord Group: https://discord.gg/XYHhgB4
QQ Group: https://jq.qq.com/?_wv=1027&k=5pejGip
WHATS APP: https://chat.whatsapp.com/BGbrpjmCR2IIGSlIZ4nSgy
LINE Group: http://line.me/ti/g/wf7kr5l36s
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tacticalmonsters
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tacticalmons
